response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which we believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. Given its unique features and the potential it holds for your business, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $750,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this investment carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 750000}
